birth_place.zh-cn: 河南永城县芒山镇磨山村
birth_place.en: Moshan Village, Mangshan Town, Yongcheng County, Henan

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产主义青年团河南省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产主义青年团河南省委员会

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议河南省委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议河南省委员会
en: Henan Provincial Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议第七届全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第七届全国委员会
en: 7th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 阎济民是河南永城县芒山镇磨山村人。
description.en: Yan Jimin was a native of Moshan Village, Mangshan Town, Yongcheng County, Henan.

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科分类，阎济民是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to Wikipedia categories, Yan Jimin was a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 阎济民早年参加抗日战争。
description.en: Yan Jimin participated in the Second Sino-Japanese War in his early years.

description.zh-cn: 阎济民曾任淮阳地委组织部部长。
description.en: Yan Jimin served as the Minister of the Organization Department of the Huaiyang Prefectural Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立后，阎济民供职于中共河南省委组织部。
description.en: After the founding of the People's Republic of China, Yan Jimin worked in the Organization Department of the CPC Henan Provincial Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产主义青年团河南省委员会

description.zh-cn: 阎济民曾任共青团河南省委书记。
description.en: Yan Jimin served as the Secretary of the Henan Provincial Committee of the Communist Youth League.

description.zh-cn: 1954年，阎济民调入洛阳轴承厂，任厂长。
description.en: In 1954, Yan Jimin was transferred to the Luoyang Bearing Factory and served as its director.

description.zh-cn: 1979年，阎济民担任中共洛阳市委第一书记。
description.en: In 1979, Yan Jimin served as the First Secretary of the CPC Luoyang Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1979年，阎济民担任河南省副省长。
description.en: In 1979, Yan Jimin served as the Vice Governor of Henan Province.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议河南省委员会

description.zh-cn: 1985年，阎济民任河南省政协副主席。
description.en: In 1985, Yan Jimin served as the Vice Chairman of the Henan Provincial Committee of the CPPCC.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议河南省委员会

description.zh-cn: 1988年至1993年，阎济民任河南省政协主席。
description.en: From 1988 to 1993, Yan Jimin served as the Chairman of the Henan Provincial Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科分类，阎济民曾任洛阳市革命委员会主任。
description.en: According to Wikipedia categories, Yan Jimin served as the Director of the Luoyang Municipal Revolutionary Committee.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议第七届全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科分类，阎济民是第七届全国政协委员。
description.en: According to Wikipedia categories, Yan Jimin was a member of the 7th National Committee of the CPPCC.
